data.text: a break in or as if in a material object: gap
examples: The … weedy hiatus between the town and the railroad.
… the hiatus between the theory and the practice of the party …

data.text: a gap or passage in an anatomical part or organ
examples: The … weedy hiatus between the town and the railroad.
… the hiatus between the theory and the practice of the party …

data.text: an interruption in time or continuity: break; especially: a period when something (such as a program or activity) is suspended or interrupted
examples: The … weedy hiatus between the town and the railroad.
… the hiatus between the theory and the practice of the party …

data.text: protrusion of part of the stomach upward into the chest cavity through the passage in the diaphragm for the esophagus usually with movement of the opening of the esophagus into the stomach to a position above the diaphragm —called also hiatus hernia
